title: Intro to Neuromorphic Computing
description: A brief introduction to neuromorphic computing and its applications.
details: This event will cover the basics of neuromorphic computing, including potential applications in various industries.

title: Neuromorphic Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop for neuromorphic hardware and software development.
details: Participants will work with neuromorphic hardware and software tools to build simple neural networks.

title: AI and Neuromorphic Synergy
description: Exploring the intersection of AI and neuromorphic computing.
details: Experts in AI and neuromorphic computing will discuss how these two fields can synergize for better outcomes.
